article_title: Healthcare Service Providers Rush To China ... But Should They?

article_metadata.description: Over the last two years, foreign interest in China’s healthcare system has changed focus from a heavy emphasis on pharmaceuticals and devices to actual healthcare service delivery providers. Private hospitals, post-acute care, rehabilitation, senior care and home healthcare have all become areas where private foreign investment is beginning to flow [...]
article_metadata.author: Benjamin Shobert
